title: US Races Culled from UCI Cyclocross World Cup Calendar for 2024-25
content:
No racing in Waterloo, Fayetteville, or Iowa next winter for first time in four years as UCI introduces new round in Sardinia, adds 'protected status' to four races.

Read the full article at US Races Culled from UCI Cyclocross World Cup Calendar for 2024-25 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
